title: MD
biography: The Chenini Member is a geological member of the Ain el Guettar Formation in Tunisia, whose strata date back to the Late Aptian to Early Albian stages of the Cretaceous period. The lithology consists of coarse sandstones with occasional conglomerates and mudstones. Dinosaur remains are among the fossils that have been recovered from the formation.
aiSummary: Samir Bouaziz is a cardiology specialist with an H-index of 27 at Charles Nicolle Hospital (Member). Has been published in Applied Clay Science, Journal of African Earth Sciences, Comptes Rendus Géoscience. Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.
